name: Asteroids VR
detailed_description:
Please Note: This game requires a Virtual Reality headset to play.

Play the timeless classic in a 21st century finish. Asteroids VR brings the feel of arcades back, only this time compete against players from all around the world.

Float through space and destroy the asteroids before they crash into you in a beautiful interpretation of a classic arcade game. The gameplay is seated and the ship is controlled with a virtual joystick with your VR controllers. Just kick back, listen to the beautiful soundtracks, relax and shoot some asteroids and alien spaceships.
